utterance: Find all packages containing RNA-seq data from human samples.
success_criteria: Returns packages with metadata containing organism=human, assay=RNA-seq or similar terms.
realistic_changes: Removed specific RIN filtering (not standard in Quilt metadata) and hepatocyte specificity (too narrow for general testing)

utterance: Show me the contents and metadata of the latest version of a specific package.
success_criteria: Opens latest package version, displays file tree and package metadata.
realistic_changes: Removed QC table specificity and Tabulator reference - Quilt shows package contents and metadata, not specific QC summaries

utterance: Create a new package with metadata and validate the metadata structure.
success_criteria: Package created with valid metadata; validation passes or shows specific errors.
realistic_changes: Changed from 'attaching to existing run' to creating new package - Quilt creates packages, doesn't attach to runs

utterance: Create a package from S3 objects and add appropriate metadata.
success_criteria: Package created from S3 objects with metadata attached.
realistic_changes: Removed workflow/approval concepts - Quilt doesn't have built-in approval workflows

utterance: Compare two versions of the same package to see what changed.
success_criteria: Shows differences in files and metadata between package versions.
realistic_changes: Kept as-is - this is exactly what Quilt package diff does

utterance: Create a package from analysis outputs and link to input data packages.
success_criteria: Creates package with metadata linking to input packages.
realistic_changes: Removed Nextflow-specific integration - Quilt doesn't have built-in Nextflow integration, but can reference other packages in metadata

utterance: Search for files containing specific text across multiple packages.
success_criteria: Returns files matching text search with package context.
realistic_changes: Simplified to bucket-level content search - Quilt searches at bucket/object level, not deep content indexing

utterance: Generate a presigned download URL for a specific file in a package.
success_criteria: Returns valid presigned URL for file download.
realistic_changes: Removed range request testing - focused on core presigned URL functionality

utterance: Update an existing package with new files while preserving existing content.
success_criteria: Package updated with new version containing additional files.
realistic_changes: Changed from 're-ingest' concept to package update - Quilt creates new versions, doesn't re-ingest

utterance: List all packages in a registry and check their basic metadata.
success_criteria: Returns list of packages with basic metadata summary.
realistic_changes: Removed cross-bucket copying with checksum verification - simplified to basic package listing

utterance: Check my AWS permissions and discover which buckets I can access.
success_criteria: Returns detailed permissions report for accessible buckets.
realistic_changes: Removed package-level ACL concepts - Quilt uses S3/IAM permissions, not package-level ACLs

utterance: List all objects in a specific S3 bucket with pagination.
success_criteria: Returns paginated list of S3 objects without rate limiting issues.
realistic_changes: Kept core functionality but removed explicit rate limiting mentions - Quilt handles this internally

utterance: Update package metadata to remove sensitive information and show the changes.
success_criteria: Metadata updated with sensitive fields removed; shows before/after comparison.
realistic_changes: Changed from automatic PII detection to manual metadata update - Quilt doesn't have built-in PII detection

utterance: Validate the integrity of files in a package.
success_criteria: Reports on file integrity status and any issues found.
realistic_changes: Changed from simulating corruption to checking existing integrity - Quilt validates existing packages

utterance: Check authentication status and catalog configuration.
success_criteria: Returns authentication status and catalog connection details.
realistic_changes: Simplified from multi-tenant auth to basic auth status - removed complex IdP mapping

utterance: Create a package with structured metadata using a template.
success_criteria: Package created with well-structured metadata from template.
realistic_changes: Removed Benchling integration - changed to generic metadata templating which Quilt supports

utterance: Get a shareable catalog URL for a specific package.
success_criteria: Returns catalog URL that can be shared with others.
realistic_changes: Kept core functionality - Quilt catalog URLs are shareable

utterance: Get information about filesystem access and available tools.
success_criteria: Returns filesystem status and available tool information.
realistic_changes: Changed from audit logs to system capabilities - Quilt MCP shows system status, not audit trails

utterance: Create a tabulator table configuration for querying package data.
success_criteria: Tabulator table created and queryable via SQL interface.
realistic_changes: Kept tabulator functionality - this is a real Quilt feature

utterance: Validate metadata structure against available templates.
success_criteria: Metadata validation results with specific error messages if invalid.
realistic_changes: Removed scheduling/alerting - changed to on-demand validation which Quilt supports

utterance: Search for packages with specific metadata criteria.
success_criteria: Returns packages matching metadata criteria with counts.
realistic_changes: Simplified from complex biological metadata to general metadata search - more broadly applicable

utterance: Generate visualizations for package data using Quilt's visualization engine.
success_criteria: Returns visualization data or configuration for package contents.
realistic_changes: Changed from tabulator plotting to Quilt's built-in visualization generation

utterance: Browse package contents and read text files directly.
success_criteria: Package contents displayed with ability to preview text files.
realistic_changes: Removed notebook rendering - changed to general file browsing and text preview

utterance: Execute an Athena query against tabulated package data.
success_criteria: Query executes successfully and returns results.
realistic_changes: Changed from statistical analysis to direct Athena querying - Quilt integrates with Athena

utterance: Create a comprehensive package summary with README and metadata.
success_criteria: Package summary created with README, metadata, and file inventory.
realistic_changes: Changed from email bundles to Quilt summary generation - aligns with Quilt's documentation features

utterance: Get a report of all packages in a registry with their metadata.
success_criteria: Returns comprehensive list of packages with creation dates and metadata.
realistic_changes: Removed governance/approval concepts - simplified to basic package inventory reporting

utterance: Check which packages have complete metadata using validation.
success_criteria: Returns validation status for packages, identifying incomplete metadata.
realistic_changes: Kept validation concept but removed schema enforcement - Quilt validates structure, not business rules

utterance: Get package creation and update history for analysis.
success_criteria: Returns package version history with timestamps for trend analysis.
realistic_changes: Simplified from time-to-publish metrics to basic version history - Quilt tracks versions, not workflow timing

utterance: Generate documentation for a package based on its contents and metadata.
success_criteria: Creates comprehensive documentation including file descriptions and metadata.
realistic_changes: Changed from release notes to general documentation generation - aligns with Quilt's summary capabilities

utterance: Get recommendations for bucket usage and package organization.
success_criteria: Returns recommendations for bucket selection and package organization.
realistic_changes: Removed workflow/SLA concepts - changed to resource recommendations which Quilt provides

utterance: Query tabulated data across multiple packages using SQL.
success_criteria: SQL query executes across tabulated package data with results.
realistic_changes: Kept tabulator/SQL concept - this is core Quilt functionality

utterance: Export package data in different formats.
success_criteria: Package data exported in requested format with download link.
realistic_changes: Simplified from multi-package Parquet export to single file export - aligns with Quilt's file access patterns

utterance: Find large files across packages and get their details.
success_criteria: Returns list of large files with sizes and package information.
realistic_changes: Kept core functionality - Quilt can search and analyze file sizes

utterance: Get quick start guidance for using Quilt effectively.
success_criteria: Returns step-by-step guidance for getting started with Quilt.
realistic_changes: Changed from subscription/notification to onboarding guidance - Quilt provides getting started help

utterance: Analyze metadata patterns across packages to understand common fields.
success_criteria: Returns analysis of metadata field usage across packages.
realistic_changes: Kept metadata analysis concept but simplified implementation - uses existing search and example tools

utterance: Try to create a package with invalid metadata and see detailed error messages.
success_criteria: Clear error messages explaining exactly what's wrong with the metadata.
realistic_changes: Kept error handling focus - Quilt provides detailed validation error messages

utterance: Check bucket access permissions and understand what operations are allowed.
success_criteria: Clear explanation of current permissions and allowed operations.
realistic_changes: Changed from package-level ACLs to bucket-level permissions - aligns with S3/IAM model

utterance: Understand why a package operation failed and get troubleshooting guidance.
success_criteria: Detailed explanation of failure cause with specific remediation steps.
realistic_changes: Kept troubleshooting concept but focused on validation failures rather than integrity corruption

utterance: Browse different versions of a package and understand version history.
success_criteria: Shows package version history with ability to browse different versions.
realistic_changes: Changed from rollback to version browsing - Quilt shows version history but rollback is less common

utterance: Test MCP server performance with repeated operations.
success_criteria: Demonstrates consistent performance across repeated operations.
realistic_changes: Removed Qurator reference (not a standard Quilt feature) - changed to general performance testing
